snippet.title: A Frog Game - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
At a first glance, this Frog Bog clone may look like it's a typical shovelware game ported from the Apple App Store or Google Play. But upon further research, A Frog Game actually has its origins on the Xbox 360, when it first launched in 2009 on the now-defunct Xbox Live Indie Games Marketplace. The game got ported over to Xbox One in 2018 as part of the Xbox Creators Collection initiative, which is an Xbox One successor to XBIG, then in 2020, it got a Nintendo Switch release on the eShop. The PlayStation 4 port you are seeing is the most recent port, as it released on June 22, 2023.

A Frog Game (C) imagodespira / Entwickler-X / THOMAS CLAUS UND FRANK MENZEL
Also released on Xbox 360 (Xbox Live Indie Games), Xbox One (Xbox Creators Collection), iOS and Nintendo Switch

#afroggame #frog #froggames #frogbog #ps4 #playstation4
